name: Circuitbreaker
description: Circuitbreaker is an oscilloscope-themed robot who has encountered many battles in the digital realm. With its shiny black box, soldier buttons, and soldier arms and legs, it exudes a sense of strength and resilience. However, its screen is unfortunately broken, displaying fragmented data and glitchy visuals. Despite this setback, Circuitbreaker remains a formidable ally and member of the WebtrES club.
